instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3787: What is 820-3787? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-3332: What is 820-3332? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.3V3_S0: What is 3V3_S0? Abbreviation for PP3V3_S0, a 3.3v power rail present when the machine is in an S0 working state.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A shuts down on battery power
threads.message:
Hi, got an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A that sometimes shuts down on 90% or 6% battery charge. It doesn't shut down instantly, it shuts down like battery is discharged. It doesn't do it on charger. 

Tried 3 different batteries. OEM and Generic. Same issue.
Updated BIOS, no change.
Tried with another motherboard and it worked ok. 

No signs of damage

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A shuts down on battery power
threads.message:
You can try disabling GPU.
Changing the FDMF6808N chips is another option.

Any error pops up, starting in diagnostic mode?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A shuts down on battery power
threads.message: How can i disable the GPU? I removed  <RESISTOR>R8900</RESISTOR> and  <RESISTOR>R8901</RESISTOR> but now it freezes on startup .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A shuts down on battery power
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> can be converted from discrete to UMA in the same manner as <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (2013).

Must force backlight adjust signal, to avoid wake from sleep issue:
- remove <RESISTOR>R7780</RESISTOR> and inject <SIGNAL>3V3_S0</SIGNAL> to <SIGNAL>LCD_BKLT_PWM_R</SIGNAL>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A shuts down on battery power
threads.message:
I disabled the GPU and changed  the FDMF6808N  chips but same issue. 

Diagnostics show nothing.

It doesnt shut down in safemode.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A shuts down on battery power
threads.message:
Did you test with USB macOS?

Try fresh install on internal SSD too.
